name: Mirror: Songs of the Maidens
detailed_description:
This DLC contains 12 originally composed songs for the 12 main characters in lossless format. Each song has 2 versions, vocal and pure music.

✿ Daisy——Can't stop Loving you
✿ Youko——季節外れ、散る紅葉
✿ Caiyun——Eternity Night
✿ Lin——穏やかな陽だまりの下で
✿ Unita——Burning Spirit
✿ Ketsuno Ana——華が散れども
✿ Ebony——Beautiful Than Gold
✿ Martha——迷える羊達
✿ Leah——Nightmare Dream
✿ Madoka——カナリア
✿ Mafercca——Beauty like a Magic
✿ Hill——Moon Prison
✿ Medley of all 12 songs——少女の唄

Instructions:
After purchasing, you can enter Music Gallery in-game to enjoy the music or find the songs in dlc_song in the root folder.
The last song you can play in-game, the medley called 少女の唄, is compressed to .ogg format because the original lossless file may be to big that may cause failure. You can find the lossless .wav file under root folder/dlc_songs.
